DataElement.preferredName: Undescended Testis Personal Medical History Indicator Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether or not an individual has a history of undescended testis and which testicle is effected.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The failure of one or both testes of a male fetus to descend from the abdomen into the scrotum during the late part of pregnancy. If not surgically corrected in early childhood, males may be at increased risk for testicular cancer later in life._A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The failure of one or both testes of a male fetus to descend from the abdomen into the scrotum during the late part of pregnancy. If not surgically corrected in early childhood, males may be at increased risk for testicular cancer later in life.

Concepts.definition: The failure of one or both testes of a male fetus to descend from the abdomen into the scrotum during the late part of pregnancy. If not surgically corrected in early childhood, males may be at increased risk for testicular cancer later in life.

Property.preferredDefinition: an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Testicular Enrollment form per request by T.Lichtenberg. mc 9/13/13

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The failure of one or both testes of a male fetus to descend from the abdomen into the scrotum during the late part of pregnancy. If not surgically corrected in early childhood, males may be at increased risk for testicular cancer later in life._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied._A condition or state at a particular time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else. : Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.: Either of the paired male reproductive glands that produce the male germ cells and the male hormones.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.
Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.
Either of the paired male reproductive glands that produce the male germ cells and the male hormones.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.
